body:
Comment 20 by **simonedichiara@maior.biz**: 
I tried, as far as I can, to track down the problem.
I modified os/exec/exec.go like this: log.Println("START FILE: " + c.Path), so that I
could look at the file it was trying to execute.
So, when gotour.exe is in the following dir "C:\Go\bin" the executed file is this:
".\go.exe". This doesn't work.

When gotour.exe is, for example, on the desktop, the executed file is this:
"C:\Go\bin\go.exe". And this works. The same is when I put gotour.exe on C: and so on.
